summary: Completed testing of Phase 10: Bulk Operations and Kanban View. All 26 backend tests passed (100%). All frontend UI tests passed. Kanban view with 4 columns working, bulk operations (Edit/Cancel/Delete) working for admin/manager, team members correctly restricted from bulk operations.
seed_data_creation: Test tasks created with TEST_BULK_ prefix during testing, cleaned up after each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 10 testing complete. Kanban view and bulk operations fully functional. All role-based access controls verified.

features_tested.kanban_view_4_columns: PASS - Kanban displays To Do, In Progress, Completed, Cancelled columns
features_tested.kanban_task_cards: PASS - 80 task cards displayed in Kanban view
features_tested.kanban_drag_drop_enabled: PASS - Task cards have draggable='true' attribute
features_tested.kanban_task_click_navigation: PASS - Clicking task card navigates to task detail page
features_tested.kanban_filters_apply: PASS - Search and priority filters work in Kanban view
features_tested.view_toggle_list_kanban: PASS - List/Kanban toggle switches between views
features_tested.bulk_selection_admin: PASS - Admin sees checkboxes and Select All button
features_tested.bulk_selection_manager: PASS - Manager sees checkboxes and Select All button
features_tested.bulk_selection_member_hidden: PASS - Team member does NOT see checkboxes or Select All
features_tested.bulk_action_bar: PASS - Bulk action bar appears when tasks selected
features_tested.bulk_edit_modal: PASS - Bulk edit modal with Status/Priority/Reassign options
features_tested.bulk_cancel_button: PASS - Bulk cancel button visible for admin/manager
features_tested.bulk_delete_button: PASS - Bulk delete button visible for admin/manager
features_tested.api_bulk_update_admin: PASS - Admin can bulk update tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_update_manager: PASS - Manager can bulk update tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_update_member_403: PASS - Team member gets 403 on bulk update
features_tested.api_bulk_cancel_admin: PASS - Admin can bulk cancel tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_cancel_manager: PASS - Manager can bulk cancel tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_cancel_member_403: PASS - Team member gets 403 on bulk cancel
features_tested.api_bulk_delete_admin: PASS - Admin can bulk delete tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_delete_manager: PASS - Manager can bulk delete tasks via API
features_tested.api_bulk_delete_member_403: PASS - Team member gets 403 on bulk delete
features_tested.status_change_for_kanban: PASS - Status changes work (todo -> in_progress -> completed -> cancelled)
features_tested.member_own_task_status: PASS - Team member can change status of their own task
features_tested.member_others_task_403: PASS - Team member cannot change status of others' tasks

api_endpoints_tested.PATCH /api/tasks/{id}: Working - Single task status update for Kanban drag-drop
api_endpoints_tested.GET /api/tasks: Working - Filters apply correctly for Kanban view

role_based_access_verified.admin: Full access to bulk operations (Edit, Cancel, Delete)
role_based_access_verified.manager: Full access to bulk operations (Edit, Cancel, Delete)
role_based_access_verified.team_member: No access to bulk operations (403 Forbidden), can only update own task status
